vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐνδεχομένως,
adverb of {ἐνδέχομαι}, ={ὅσον ἐνδέχεται}, Decrees cited in [LXX+4th c.BC+]; ὡς ἐ. [Refs]; ἀντέγραψεν ἐ. to the best of his ability, Aristeas [Refs]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to the best of his ability
vocabInfos.mediumDef: to the best of his ability
